previous.excerpt: ZeroBlur is a 100% free Chrome extension to quickly blur sensitive information. Stop worrying about leaking sensitive data when delivering a product demo or a sales call. In few clicks you'll be able to blur any element or page area of any web app or website.
previous.title: ZeroBlur - Blur sensitive information and share screen with confidence

next.excerpt: Around's radically unique video calls are designed to help hybrid-remote teams create, collaborate and celebrate together. Now comes with music and games for team bonding and connection. Try it for your next happy hour or co-working session.
next.title: Around 3.0 - Video calls with music and games for your next happy hour
